summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a signed arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell, along with related application documents, on June 29, 2020. It indicates coordination between court personnel regarding her arrest and arraignment.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual for whom the signed arrest warrant and GPS monitoring application were prepared, indicating her imminent arrest.

events.title: Issuance of Maxwell arrest warrant
events.description: A signed arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell was issued and forwarded via email among court and law enforcement personnel.

keyFacts: A signed arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell was issued on June 29, 2020.
The email chain includes attachments for an arrest warrant and a GPS monitoring application for Maxwell.
The communication involves court personnel from the New York Southern District (NYSD) coordinating the warrant and arraignment process.
